item1: Walt Disney Company, together subsidiaries through which businesses conducted (the Company), diversified worldwide entertainment company operations three segments: Entertainment, Sports Experiences. terms “Company”, “we”, “our” “us” used report refer collectively parent company subsidiaries through which businesses conducted.
